post.description: addSubscriptions() REST API is used to place one or multiple subscriptions to the customer along with payment/coupon information.
addTVODOrder() REST API place an order for VOD products to the customer.
applycoupon() REST API is used to apply the coupon based on coupon code, defined for product/package.
authenticateCustomer() REST API is used to authenticate the customer along with concurrent session limit and No. of Allowed devices, if the details are provided.
changePassword() REST API is used to change the password of an account in Evergent system.
changeService () REST API is used to upgrade or downgrade the existing service of the customer.
checkCredentials() REST API is used to get the contact details of an account in Evergent system.
checkPIN() REST API is used to validate the PIN that is set to the account.
createUser() REST API is used to create an account in Evergent system.

20224.description: Account with the given CustomerID already exists

20292.description: Account with the given Details already exists

20293.description: Offer is already active on your Number, valid till given Endate

20297.description: User ID should not exceed 100 characters

20383.description: User Name - Spaces are not allowed

post.description: forgotContactPassword() REST API is used to reset the contact password of the customer. If this api is executed customer will be notified with a mail containing reset password link.
getAccountDevices() REST API is used to get the active subscriptions of an account in Evergent system.
getAccountPairedCouponCodes() REST API is used to fetch coupon details for the Customer Account.
getActiveSubscriptions() REST API is used to get the active subscriptions of an account in Evergent system.
getContact() REST API is used to get all the available contact details of the customer.
getOrderDetails() REST API fetches the details of the order. I.e. productName, nextPaymentDate, promotionEndDate, promotionType, promotionPeriod, promotionDuration, PromotionId.
getPaymentMethods() REST API is used to fetch i.e., return the available payment method information of the customer.
getPayments() REST API is used to get all posted, pending and declined payments for the account in Evergent system.
getPriceCharge() REST API is used to get the price charged while updating/downgrading the service for the account or not.
getProducts() REST API is used to get the products list available to that DMA.
getSubscriptionHistory() REST API is used to fetch all the products which are expired .
getVoucherDetails() REST API fetches the details of the coupon. I.e. Expiry date, start date, validity of the coupon, Product details linked to the coupon and the promotions defined to the coupon.
isCustomerEligibleForFreeTrial() REST API is verify whether the customer is eligible for free trial for the account or not.
isValidCoupon () REST API is used to verify whether the coupon is valid or not.
pairCustomer() REST API is used to pair coupon details for the existing Customer Account.
pauseSubscription() REST API is used to pause the subscription of the Customer.
reactivateService () REST API is used to reactivate the canceled service of the customer.
recordPlayTime() REST API is used to change the validity of the VOD once viewing of the video is started for the time which is set to the video.
redeemCoupon() REST API is used to redeem a voucher on existing order for the account.
rremoveDeviceForAccount() REST API is used to remove the existing device for the Customer Account.
removeSubscription () REST API removes a subscription to the customer.
resetPassword() REST API is used to reset the password for the account in Evergent system.
sendEmail() REST API is used to send an email to the customer based on the template defined.
updateParentalControlDetails() REST API is used to update parental control details to the account.
updatePaymentInfo() REST API is used to add/ edit the new/existing payment method information of the user.
updatePin() REST API is used to update the contact PIN for the account.
updateProfile() REST API is used to update//edit the existing user/contact information of the customer like firstName, lastName, email etc.
validateToken() REST API is used to validate the token of the customer.
